name: The Little Prince VR
description:
"It is only with the heart that one can see truly"
The Little Prince VR is an interactive adventure that follows the events of Antoine de Saint-Exupery's masterpiece.

Virtual Reality allows the players to immerse into Saint-Exupery's creation, interact with the world and its characters like never before.They become both spectators and actors of the adventure, getting touched by its grace at a deep emotional level.

The Player escorts the Little Prince, in his discovery journey, from planet to planet. Each episode centers on a planet and a key character from the book. Help them solve their problems and learn something about grown-ups, and life in general; as each new encounter is an allegory of human nature.In the first episode: The Players team up with the Little Prince and the fox, as they are preparing to start a new discovery journey. A unique, VR native, mechanic allows players to assemble 3D objects that will help them progress through the adventure.

The players will help the Little Prince in his daily routine: clean the volcanoes, dig out baobab seeds, and take care of the Rose.
After rebuilding a broken plane, the players will take the commands and fly the Little Prince from planet to planet.About the Little Prince
The Little Prince is the most famous work of French aristocrat, writer, poet, and pioneering aviator Antoine de Saint-Exupéry. 
Since its first publication in 1943 the novella sold over 140 Million copies, making it the #4 best selling book ever published.
With 300 official translations, it is the most translated fiction ever published. Over 2 Million copies are still sold every year.
